page.title: 09HOUSING IN H.GREEN&HAZLEMERE
page.content: In Holmer Green in 1985 there are 396 detached houses but 15% of the total number of detached properties are bungalows. There is a very high percentage (approx.98%) of home owner ship.Only two roads are council properties namely Penfold Cottages and Sheepcote Cottages.All homes have main drainage.Almost all properties have front and rear gardens,mostly fenced in.New estates have open plan front gardens.Most houses have garages.Some properties are built with brick and some with flint.The majority are red brick buildings,with manufactured roof tiles.Older properties have slate roofs.The large housing estates are Park,Manor Farm,Hill Farm and Clementi, most are post 1970.A typical house on these estates is a 3\4 bedroomed semi with lounge,dining room,kitchen, bathroom and garage.
